channel.itunes:summary: The Big Fix Podcast Series features news, commentary, and helpful hints on IT security and systems management trends and technologies. For more information visit http://www.bigfix.com/content/mediaroom

item.title: Early Returns From the BigFix-Trend Micro Technology Alliance
item.itunes:author: Amrit Williams
item.itunes:subtitle: The BigFix Podcast Series
item.itunes:summary: Amrit Williams, BigFix CTO and Tom Miller, Trend Micro Enterprise Business Unit VP interview Mark Starry, Concord (New Hampshire) Hospital Enterprise Architect and Security Director on Starry's experience with the BigFix-Trend Micro endpoint security solution. Starry reports solid economic gains in sometimes unexpected places. For example, endpoint computer performance gains that enabling the hospital to move from a three-year refresh cycle for PCs to a four-year cycle.

item.title: Security, System Management, and Healthcare: In Conversation with Mark Starry
item.itunes:author: Amrit Williams
item.itunes:subtitle: The BigFix Podcast Series
item.itunes:summary: Amrit Williams and Concord Hospital (Concord, NH) Director of Security Architecture Mark Starry discuss how initiatives such as HIPAA, electronic medical records, privacy, and doctor's clinical needs influence security and system management programs in a healthcare delivery organization. In particular, Starry emphases the need for functional and process consolidation, visibility into IT assets, and taking a proactive approach to protecting data to enable its productive availability to qualified users while preventing its misuse.
